name: Roland Foods Marinated Quartered Artichoke Hearts, Specialty Imported Food, 5 Lb 8 Oz Can
short_description: MARINATED ARTICHOKE HEARTS: Great in antipasti plates, pastas, and salads
MILD AND NUTTY: Firm yet tender texture and aromatic flavor enhanced with vinegar and spices
READY TO EAT: Enjoy the quartered artichoke hearts directly from the can with no preparation needed
RESTAURANT QUALITY: Bulk 5 Lb 8 Oz can is ideal for use in food service or in the home
IMPORTED FROM SPAIN: A gourmet international specialty food product
product_description: Marinated in oil, vinegar, and spices and ready to eat, Roland Foods Marinated Quartered Artichoke Hearts are an ideal choice for pepping up salad and pasta dishes. Part of the sunflower family, artichokes are beloved around the world for their unique nutty flavor and firm yet tender texture. These artichoke heart quarters are deliciously seasoned right out of the can, making them a simple yet delectable addition to a variety of appetizer ideas and main dishes. Whether added in the kitchen to antipasti plates and pastas or set out as a salad topping for guests, the bulk-sized 5 Lb 8 Oz can ensures that busy salad bars, buffet lines, and kitchens are properly stocked. Since 1934, Roland Foods’ versatile team of veteran chefs, food lovers, and logistics wizards have connected people around the world to explore their culinary passions. Roland Foods imports more than 1,500 products from North America, South America, Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Roland Foods Whole Extra Large Artichoke Hearts, 25-30 Count, 5 Lb 8 Oz Can
short_description: WHOLE ARTICHOKE HEARTS: Meaty, and juicy our artichoke hearts are pleasant in bold rich recipes
MILD AND NUTTY FLAVOR: Our artichoke hearts are firm yet tender with a mild and nutty taste that is delicious with any Italian dish
PREPARATION: Our Extra Large Artichoke Hearts are ready to use right out of the can
GLUTEN FREE AND KOSHER: A delicious zero trans-fat, gluten free, and kosher treat for any meal
RECIPE INSPIRATIONS: Tasty on their own, in a salad, pasta sauce, hummus, on pizza, or in artichoke dip
product_description: Roland Foods Extra Large Artichoke Hearts are imported from Peru for the best mild and nutty flavors. Artichokes, the immature flower buds of a plant in the sunflower family, have a delicious mild and nutty flavor. Roland Extra Large Artichoke Hearts have a firm yet tender texture. A tasty zero trans-fat, gluten free, and kosher addition to any meal. These extra large, meaty, and delicious artichoke hearts are the perfect addition to bold rich recipes. Try them in dips and blended in hummus or chopped and tossed with hot or cold pasta. Since 1934, our versatile team of veteran chefs, food lovers and logistics wizards have connected people around the world to explore their culinary passions. Roland Foods imports more than 1,500 products from North America, South America, Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.
